Title: 'Pain, betrayal, sadness': Danish veterans describe shock of Trump admin rhetoric
Description:

Title: Microsoft Teams wants to become your boss' lapdog, automatically snitching on your live location inside the office Wi-Fi — but it won't ship until it's bug-free

It is expected to roll out to broad availability by mid-March this year.
